payload.title: Implement complete ActorRecord operations in identity_adapter
payload.description: Implement all ActorRecord-related methods in identity_adapter: createActor (with key generation, signing, validation), getActor, listActors, and revokeActor. Ensure proper orchestration of crypto, factory, validator, and store modules without using 'any'.
payload.notes: Successfully implemented 4 core ActorRecord methods with proper TypeScript typing and module orchestration. AgentRecord operations marked as requiring additional modules.
